actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Security and Scientific Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Inter-American Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security and Scientific Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of the special authorities contained in sections 506(a), 610(a), and 614(a) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 in order to provide military assistance for El Salvador during the remainder of fiscal year 1982 and during fiscal year 1983.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of specified special authorities provisions of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to provide military assistance for El Salvador.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of the special authorities contained in sections 506(a), 610(a), and 614(a) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 in order to provide military assistance for El Salvador during the remainder of fiscal year 1982 and during fiscal year 1983.
